Description: Ostracon, fragment of the body of a brown pottery vessel, the fabric is partially grey in section, the exterior, which is slightly grooved, is covered with a self-slip and faint traces of two lines of Coptic text written in black ink.
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (394692) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/394692)
